0.name: MOUNTAIN CLIMBER
0.description: Start in the push-up position. Bend your right knee towards your chest and keep your left leg straight, then quickly switch from one leg to the other. This exercise strengthens multiple muscle groups.

1.name: SIDE BRIDGES LEFT
1.description: Lie on your right side. Put your right elbow directly under your shoulders and put your left hand on your waist. Place your left leg on your right leg. Raise your hips upward, hold for 2-4 seconds, then go back to the start position. Repeat this exercise.

2.name: SIDE BRIDGES RIGHT
2.description: Lie on your right side. Put your right elbow directly under your shoulders and put your left hand on your waist. Place your left leg on your right leg. Raise your hips upward, hold for 2-4 seconds, then go back to the start position. Repeat this exercise.

3.name: BUTT RIDGE
3.description: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor. Put your arms flat at your sides. Then lift your butt up and down.

4.name: BICYCLE CRUNCHES
4.description: Lie on the floor with your hands behind your ears. Raise your knees and close your right elbow toward your left knee, then close your left elbow toward your right knee. Repeat the exercise.

5.name: V-UP
5.description: Lie on your back with your arms and legs extended and your legs squeezed together. Raise your upper body and legs, use your arms to touch your toes, then go back to the start position and repeat the exercise.

6.name: HEEL TOUCH
6.description: Lie on the ground with your legs bent and your arms by your sides. Slightly lift your upper body off the floor and make your hands alternately reach your heels.

7.name: ABDOMINAL CRUNCHES
7.description: Lie on your back with your knees bent and your arms stretched forward. Then lift your upper body off the floor. Hold for a few seconds and slowly return. It primarily works the rectus abdominis muscle and the obliques.

8.name: PLANK
8.description: Lie on the floor with your toes and forearms on the ground. Keep your body straight and hold this position as long as you can. This exercise strengthens the abdomen back and shoulders.

9.name: CROSSOVER CRUNCH
9.description: Lie on your back with your knees bent and your hands behind your ears. Raise and twist your torso so your right elbow moves to meet your left knee. Repeat with the other side.

10.name: LEG RAISES
10.description: Lie down on your back, and put your hands beneath your hips for support. Then lift your legs up until they form a right angle with the floor. Slowly bring your legs back down and repeat the exercise.

11.name: BICYCLE CRUNCHES
11.description: Lie on the floor with your hands behind your ears. Raise your knees and close your right elbow toward your left knee, then close your left elbow toward your right knee. Repeat the exercise.

12.name: PUSH-UP & ROTATION
12.description: Start in the push-up position. Then go down for a push-up and as you come up, rotate your upper body and extend your right arm upwards. Repeat the exercise with the other arm. It's a great exercise for the chest, shoulders, arms and core.

13.name: SIDE PLANK RIGHT
13.description: Lie on your right side with your forearm supporting your body. Hold your body in a straight line. This exercise targets the abdominal muscles and obliques.

14.name: SIDE PLANK LEFT
14.description: Lie on your left side with your forearm supporting your body. Hold your body in a straight line. This exercise targets the abdominal muscles and obliques.

15.name: COBRA STRETCH
15.description: Lie down on your stomach and bend your elbows with your hands beneath your shoulders. Then push your chest up off the ground as far as possible. Hold this position for seconds.

16.name: SPINE LUMBAR TWIST STRETCH LEFT
16.description: Lie on your back with your legs extended. Lift your left leg up and use your right hand to pull your left knee to the right, but keep your other arm extended to the side on the floor. Hold this position for a few seconds.

17.name: SPINE LUMBAR TWIST STRETCH RIGHT
17.description: Lie on your back with your legs extended. Lift your right leg up and use your left hand to pull your right knee to the left, but keep your other arm extended to the side on the floor. Hold this position for a few seconds.

18.name: SIDE PLANK RIGHT
18.description: Lie on your right side with your forearm supporting your body. Hold your body in a straight line. This exercise targets the abdominal muscles and obliques.

19.name: SIDE PLANK LEFT
19.description: Lie on your left side with your forearm supporting your body. Hold your body in a straight line. This exercise targets the abdominal muscles and obliques.

20.name: PUSH-UP & ROTATION
20.description: Start in the push-up position. Then go down for a push-up and as you come up, rotate your upper body and extend your right arm upwards. Repeat the exercise with the other arm. It's a great exercise for the chest, shoulders, arms and core.

21.name: RUSSIAN TWIST
21.description: Sit on the floor with your knees bent, feel lifted a little bit and back tilted backwards. Then hold your hands together and twist from side to side.

22.name: BUTT RIDGE
22.description: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor. Put your arms flat at your sides. Then lift your butt up and down.
